title: @filter: Data.List.filter
description:
# Data.List.filter

Escreva a função filter do prelude utilizando recursão

```hs
main = do
    print $ myfilter (>5) [0..10] == [6,7,8,9,10]
    print $ myfilter (odd) [0..10] == [1,3,5,7,9]
```

```txt
>>>>>>>>
========
[6,7,8,9,10]
[1,3,5,7,9]
<<<<<<<<
```

hs.name: Main.hs
hs.contents:
main :: IO ()
main = do
    print $ myfilter (>5) [0..10] == [6,7,8,9,10]
    print $ myfilter (odd) [0..10] == [1,3,5,7,9]
